ValidationRule.description: Ensures that user can only progress to next stage i.e. Executed or Discontinued
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Partnership', ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ,"Contract"), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Executed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Discontinued'))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only progress the opportunity to next stage i.e. Executed or Discontinued
